testimonials.name: Jane Doe
testimonials.title: Parent
testimonials.testimonial: CodeKids has been an incredible experience for my child. The instructors are knowledgeable and engaging, and my child has learned so much about coding and problem-solving.

testimonials.name: John Smith
testimonials.title: Student
testimonials.testimonial: I love the projects we work on at CodeKids! They're fun and challenging, and I've learned a lot about different coding languages and how to think like a programmer.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.title: Teacher
testimonials.testimonial: The curriculum at CodeKids is top-notch. It's well-structured and provides a great balance of theory and hands-on practice. The students are always excited to learn and create new things.

testimonials.name: Michael Brown
testimonials.title: Parent
testimonials.testimonial: My daughter has gained so much confidence since joining CodeKids. She loves the supportive environment and the chance to work on real coding projects with her peers.

testimonials.name: Emily Wilson
testimonials.title: Student
testimonials.testimonial: CodeKids is amazing! The teachers are really helpful, and I've learned so many cool things about coding. I can't wait to come back for more classes.
